message_text: You know, I was thinking today about my last visit to the barber. Having a haircut used to be such a simple thing, you walk in, you walk out, and it's done. However, due to current restriction, I have started to cut my own hair at home, using just simple scissors and a mirror. Saved me a decent chunk as I don't have to tip the barber now! Haha! Tell me, did you ever have to manage your own haircut or grooming? If so, how was your experience with that?
